typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as integer,
		CustomerId as integer,
		CompletedTime as timestamp,
		CustomerDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: ($modifiedAfter),
	modifiedBefore: ($modifiedBefore),
	entity: 'CustomerTransaction.cdm.json/CustomerTransaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'CustomerTransaction',
	corpusPath: 'logical',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 't1automationsource',
	folderPath: 'physical/CustomerTransaction',
	fileSystem: 't1automationsource') ~> CustomerTransactionDeltaSource
CustomerTransactionDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId,
		CustomerEstablishedDate = CustomerDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Customer
Customer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'Customer.cdm.json/Customer',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Customer',
	folderPath: 'physical/Customer',
	fileSystem: 't1automationtarget',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusPath: 'logical',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 't1automationtarget',
	truncate: false) ~> CustomerSink
